title: CSP/CEP Login - Add CAPTCHA to Login
custom_steps:
AC:

* After putting in relevant login information and selecting â€œSign Inâ€� on the CEP/CSP Login page, a CAPTCHA should appear for extra security purposes before the user can be taken to the CEP summary page

title: As a BOC Admin, I don't want Clubs to give Housing to any Player with an Active MJC
custom_steps:
AC:

* If an Addendum C is being created for a player that has an Active (Approved) Major League Contract:
** The Housing For Uncovered Players checkbox will not be active
* If a Minor League Contract is being created for a player that has an Active (Approved) Major League Contract:
** The Housing clause in Addendum B will not be available to be included

title: As a MNC Admin, I don't want users able to enter past dates for Add B Clauses
custom_steps:
Business Value: Currently, there is no logic to prevent users from entering past dates into Addendum B clauses on Minor League contracts (i.e. Release and Assignment Clauses) 



AC:

* On Submit and Approve of an MNC (All three types: Domestic 1st Year, DSL, Non-First Year), the system will perform a rule check to confirm all dates included in Addendum B clauses are not in the past
* If the check fails, the system will return a hard error to Club Users and an overrideable warning to BOC users:
** Title: Error
** Body: [Name of offending clause] contains a past date.  Please correct to continue.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

title: As an EBIS User, I want to see when a PTBNL is Pending to Clubs
custom_steps:
Context: Currently, when a Club submits an Outright Trade to another Club, BOC is also notified on their Clipboard. When a Club submits a PTBNL on that Trade to another Club, BOC does not see that Transaction. They are only notified when the PTBNL is formerly submitted. 

AC:

* When a Club submits Player to be Named Consideration to another Club on an existing Outright Trade, a Transaction should appear in the Clipboard for BOC
* BOC users should now receive two separate Clipboard items for Outright Trades with PTBNL

title: As a MJC Admin, I want a new soft error when asking OR Waivers on a XX(B) who signed a MNC First
custom_steps:
Business Value: Rather than the current Hard Error that prevents Clubs from asking OR Waivers on a XX(B) Free Agent who signed a Minor League UPC prior to being selected to the Major League Roster, there will be a new Soft Error to only warn them

AC:

* As a Club, navigate to the Waivers dashboard
* Select to Edit, and select a player on the Request Entry widget
** This player should have been an XXB Free Agent that signed an MNC prior to being selecting to ML
* Select â€œORâ€� as the Type, and Save
* There should be new warning that pops up that says:
** â€œ[Last Name], [First Name] was previously an XX(B) Free Agent that signed an MN Contract before being selected to a Major League Roster. By proceeding, you are confirming that the selected player is permitted to be placed on OR waivers.â€�

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Reinstatement from any IL to automatically generate a Return from Rehab Tx
custom_steps:
AC:

* Upon Submitting a Reinstate from IL Transaction, a Return from Rehab Transaction should automatically generate 
* The Return from Rehab date should equal the Reinstatement date entered on the Reinstatement Tx
* The Reason for Return should be set to To Be Reinstated from IL
* Independent Return from Rehab Transactions will still exist in the case of re-injury

title: As an EBIS User, I want to see how many days are remaining in the Championship Season
custom_steps:
AC:

* During the Championship Season, EBIS will display the Days Remaining
** It will appear at the top of the screen in the following format:
*** â€œDay 14 of Major League Championship Season / 173 Days Remaining" 
*** â€œDay ofâ€� and â€œDays Remainingâ€� will always add up to 187

title: As a MNC Admin, I want players in Extended Spring Training to be Paid their in-season rate
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new "Extended Spring Trainingâ€� System Date
** There will be a Start and End Date
* If a playerâ€™s level of play is Complex, they will earn their in-season rate during Extended Spring Training
* This will be reflected in the MN Payroll utility

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see the Addendum B Clauses Numbered on MN Contracts
custom_steps:
Business Value: To better organize the Addendum B Clauses, count the MN Terms and MJ Terms separately 

AC:

* Upon creating a new MN Contract with both Major and Minor League Terms (and selecting to Print), the Minor League Terms should be numbered (I - X) 
** ex: I. Signing Bonus, II. Assignment Clause
* The Major League Terms should restart the numbering and also be (I - X)
** ex: I. Performance Bonus, II. Award Bonus

title: Convert the taxi squad page and widget to React
custom_steps: Taxi squad page needs to be updated to React, all features should work the same on ebisui and ebisapp.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a Flag for Advanced Consent on EBIS
custom_steps:
â€œAdd a flag to the Contract Page that indicates whether a player has an Advanced Consent. Tied to a tag on the contract page, which players can check when they upload the PDF to EBIS.â€�

AC:

* Navigate to the Contracts page on a Player Profile
* There will be a new â€œAdv Consentâ€� column on the Contract History widget
* The approval of a Major Contract with the â€œAdvanced Consent under Article XIX(A)(3)â€� consideration is marked to â€œYesâ€� (Located in the Covenants section) should trigger a green checkmark in the Adv Consent column

title: AMT: As a AMT Admin, I want Clubs to attach receipts to approved Travel Forms
custom_steps:
Context: Clubs are being asked to attach travel related receipts to their travel forms.  However, once a form is approved, the attachment section is no longer editable to club users.

AC:

* The File Attachment section of approved Travel Forms in AMT will be editable for Club Users when the page is in edit mode.

title: As a R4 Admin, I want the Commissioner's Screen to display Switch Handed Pitcher
custom_steps:
AC:

* If a Switch Handed Starter or a Switch Handed Reliever is selected on the Draft Day Screen, this player will be displayed on the Commissionerâ€™s Screen as a Switch Handed Pitcher
* This is consistent with the way RHS/RHR/LHS/LHR are displayed

title: As an BOC Admin, I want EBIS to accommodate Swith Handed Pitchers
custom_steps:
AC

* There will be two new positions added to EBIS:
** Switch Handed Starter (SHS)
** Switch Handed Reliever (SHR)
* These positions will be available and displayed consistent with other positions throughout EBIS (Profiles, widgets, reports, LINK, etc)
* EBIS will be able to ingest these positions from DPL and IPL

title: As a BOC Admin, I want updates to the Lineup Cards Logic
custom_steps:
AC:

* Auditing Transactions (transactions that do not update roster status) will be omitted from the lineup card logic
** I.e. Pending Winter League Requests should not factor in
* EBIS will only look for pending transactions in the past two weeks

title: CSP/CEP Login - Turn on Signal Sciences Blocking
custom_steps: For the College Scholarship Plan & Continuing Education Program site, turn on Signal Sciences Blocking for added security
